"Bene! Ora mettilo con gli altri bei coniglietti."
—Sargis Haz, artefice

foreign_names.name: 見本に倣うもの
foreign_names.text: 見本に倣うものが戦場に出たとき、あなたは「あなたのライブラリーから他のあなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーと同じ名前を持つカード１枚を探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。」を選んでもよい。
foreign_names.flavor:
「結構！今度は別の兎でやってみましょう。」
――工匠、サルギス・ハズ

foreign_names.name: 패턴 비교자
foreign_names.text: 패턴 비교자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 당신의 서고에서 당신이 조종하는 다른 생물과 이름이 같은 카드 한 장을 찾아, 공개한 후, 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"좋아! 이제 다른 토끼들이랑 같이 놔 둬."
—기능공, 사르기스 하즈

foreign_names.name: Combinador de Padrões
foreign_names.text: Quando Combinador de Padrões entra no campo de batalha, você pode procurar em seu grimório um card com o mesmo nome de outra criatura que você controla, revelá-lo, colocá-lo em sua mão e, depois, embaralhar seu grimório.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Muito bem! Agora coloque-o com os outros coelhinhos."
— Sargis Haz, artesão

foreign_names.name: Искатель Узоров
foreign_names.text: Когда Искатель Узоров выходит на поле битвы, вы можете найти в вашей библиотеке карту с тем же именем, что у другого существа под вашим контролем, показать ее, положить в вашу руку, затем перетасовать вашу библиотеку.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Славно! А теперь положи его к остальным перепуганным зайчикам».
— Саргис Хаз, изобретатель

foreign_names.name: 配模魔像
foreign_names.text: 当配模魔像进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌，且此牌须与另一个由你操控的生物同名，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreign_names.flavor:
「很好！接下来把它和其他小白兔放在一起。」
～神器师莎琪亥

foreign_names.name: 配模魔像
foreign_names.text: 當配模魔像進戰場時，你可以從你的牌庫中搜尋一張牌，且此牌須與另一個由你操控的生物同名，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreign_names.flavor:
「很好！接下來把牠和其他小白兔放在一起。」
～神器師莎琪亥

name: Phantom Warrior
text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor:
"Only when I saw my enemy walk through all my defenses, untouchable as the moon in the sky, did I truly know what it is to be afraid."
—King Ixes
original_text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.

foreign_names.name: Phantomkrieger
foreign_names.text: Der Phantomkrieger kann nicht geblockt werden.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Erst als ich sah, wie mein gestaltloser Gegner einfach durch alle Barrieren glitt, wusste ich, was echte Angst ist."
—König Ixes

foreign_names.name: Guerrero fantasmal
foreign_names.text: El Guerrero fantasmal no puede ser bloqueado.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Solo cuando vi a mi enemigo atravesar todas mis defensas, tan impalpable como la luna en el cielo, supe de verdad lo que era el miedo".
—Rey Ixes

foreign_names.name: Guerrier fantomatique
foreign_names.text: Le Guerrier fantomatique ne peut pas être bloqué.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Ce n'est que lorsque j'ai vu mon ennemi franchir toutes mes défenses, aussi intouchable que la lune dans le ciel, que j'ai vraiment compris ce qu'était la peur. »
—Roi Ixes

foreign_names.name: Guerriero Fantasma
foreign_names.text: Il Guerriero Fantasma non può essere bloccato.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Solo quando vidi il nemico attraversare tutte le mie difese, intoccabile come la luna in cielo, compresi davvero il significato della paura."
—Re Ixes

foreign_names.name: 幻影の戦士
foreign_names.text: 幻影の戦士はブロックされない。
foreign_names.flavor:
「夜空に浮かぶ月のように、敵が衛兵の側を通り過ぎるのを見て初めて、余は真に恐れるべきものを知ったのだ。」
――イクセス王

foreign_names.name: 환상의 전사
foreign_names.text: 환상의 전사는 방어될 수 없다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"내 적이 내 모든 방어 수단을 뚫고 걸어들어오는 것을, 마치 하늘에 떠 있는 달처럼 아무런 손도 쓸 수 없는 것을 보았을 때, 나는 그제서야 두려워해야 하는 것이 무엇인지를 진정으로 깨달았다."
—익세스 왕

foreign_names.name: Guerreiro Fantasma
foreign_names.text: Guerreiro Fantasma não pode ser bloqueado.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Só quando vi meu inimigo transpor todas as minhas defesas, intocável como a lua no céu, é que eu soube o que é sentir medo de verdade."
— Rei Ixes

foreign_names.name: Призрачный Воин
foreign_names.text: Призрачный Воин не может быть заблокирован.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Когда я увидел, как мой враг проходит сквозь линии обороны, недосягаемый, словно луна в небе... вот тогда я на самом деле узнал, что такое страх».
— Король Айзес

foreign_names.name: 幽魅战士
foreign_names.text: 幽魅战士不能被阻挡。
foreign_names.flavor:
「只有当我亲眼见到敌人毫发无伤地穿越防线，像当空皓月一般伸手难及之时，我才真正知道什么叫恐惧。」
～国王依柯兹

foreign_names.name: 幽魅戰士
foreign_names.text: 幽魅戰士不能被阻擋。
foreign_names.flavor:
「只有當我親眼見到敵人毫髮無傷地穿越防線，像當空皓月一般伸手難及之時，我才真正知道什麼叫恐懼。」
～國王依柯茲

name: Plains
original_text: W

name: Plains
original_text: W

name: Plains
original_text: W

name: Plains
original_text: W

name: Planar Cleansing
text: Destroy all nonland permanents.
original_text: Destroy all nonland permanents.

foreign_names.name: Weltenreinigung
foreign_names.text: Zerstöre alle bleibenden Nichtland-Karten.

foreign_names.name: Purificación planar
foreign_names.text: Destruye todos los permanentes que no sean tierra.

foreign_names.name: Dépuration planaire
foreign_names.text: Détruisez tous les permanents non-terrain.

foreign_names.name: Pulizia Planare
foreign_names.text: Distruggi tutti i permanenti non terra.

foreign_names.name: 次元の浄化
foreign_names.text: 土地でないパーマネントをすべて破壊する。

foreign_names.name: 차원의 정화
foreign_names.text: 대지가 아닌 지속물을 모두 파괴한다.

foreign_names.name: Limpeza Planar
foreign_names.text: Destrua todas as permanentes que não sejam terrenos.

foreign_names.name: Вселенское Очищение
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте все перманенты, не являющиеся землями.

foreign_names.name: 净化时空
foreign_names.text: 消灭所有非地永久物。

foreign_names.name: 淨化時空
foreign_names.text: 消滅所有非地永久物。

name: Plummet
text: Destroy target creature with flying.
flavor:
"Even the pterodon, who chases the clouds from its skies, must bow to the great forest below."
—Mahuiz, Sun Empire archer
original_text: Destroy target creature with flying.

foreign_names.name: Absturz
foreign_names.text: Zerstöre eine fliegende Kreatur deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Selbst die Pterodons, die am Himmel den Wolken nachjagen, müssen sich vor dem großen Dschungel verneigen."
—Mahuiz, Bogenschütze des Imperiums der Sonne

foreign_names.name: En picado
foreign_names.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo con la habilidad de volar.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Incluso el pterodón que persigue las nubes por el cielo debe inclinarse ante el gran bosque a sus pies".
—Mahuiz, arquero del Imperio del Sol

foreign_names.name: Tomber à pic
foreign_names.text: Détruisez une créature avec le vol ciblée.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Même le ptérodonte à la poursuite des nuages doit s'incliner devant la grande forêt. »
—Mahuiz, archer de l'Empire du Soleil

foreign_names.name: Cadere a Picco
foreign_names.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con volare.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Persino lo pterodonte, che scaccia le nubi dai suoi cieli, deve inchinarsi alla grandiosa foresta sottostante."
—Mahuiz, arciere dell'Impero del Sole

foreign_names.name: 垂直落下
foreign_names.text: 飛行を持つクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreign_names.flavor:
「自分の縄張りから雲を追い出すプテロドンでさえ、眼下の大森林には逆らえない。」
――太陽帝国の射手、マーフウィズ

foreign_names.name: 급추락
foreign_names.text: 비행을 가진 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"하늘에서 구름을 뒤쫓는 프테로돈마저도 그 아래에 있는 거대한 숲에는 고개를 숙여야 한다."
—태양 제국 궁수, 마휘즈

foreign_names.name: Tombar
foreign_names.text: Destrua a criatura alvo com voar.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Mesmo o pterodonte, que afugenta as nuvens de seu céu, deve curvar-se perante a grande floresta abaixo."
— Mahuiz, arqueiro do Império do Sol

foreign_names.name: Стремительное Падение
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо с Полетом.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Даже птеродон, прогоняющий облака из своего неба, должен поклониться великому лесу внизу».
— Мауис, лучник Империи Солнца

foreign_names.name: 铅直落下
foreign_names.text: 消灭目标具飞行异能的生物。
foreign_names.flavor:
「就算翼牙龙能驱逐云彩，它们也得屈服于地上的茂密树林。」
～烈阳帝国弓箭手马休兹

foreign_names.name: 鉛直落下
foreign_names.text: 消滅目標具飛行異能的生物。
foreign_names.flavor:
「就算翼牙龍能驅逐雲彩，牠們也得屈服於地上的茂密樹林。」
～烈陽帝國弓箭手馬休茲

name: Portal of Sanctuary
text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature you control and each Aura attached to it to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn.
flavor:
"If you need to disappear for a while, I know a place."
—Bilivus, master archivist
original_text: {1}, {T}: Return target creature you control and each Aura attached to it to their owners' hands. Activate this ability only during your turn.

rulings.text: Equipment attached to the target creature remains on the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Portal der Zuflucht
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}: Bringe eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, und jede an sie angelegte Aura auf die Hand ihrer Besitzer zurück. Aktiviere diese Fähigkeit nur während deines Zuges.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Wenn du für ein Weilchen verschwinden musst, kenne ich da einen Ort …"
—Bilivus, Meister-Archivar

foreign_names.name: Portal del santuario
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}: Regresa la criatura objetivo que controlas y cada Aura anexada a ella a las manos de sus propietarios. Activa esta habilidad solo durante tu turno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Si necesitas desaparecer una temporada, conozco un lugar".
—Bilivus, maestro archivista

foreign_names.name: Portail du sanctuaire
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T} : Renvoyez une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez et chaque aura qui lui est attachée dans les mains de leurs propriétaires. N'activez cette capacité que pendant votre tour.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Si vous avez besoin de disparaître un moment, je sais exactement où aller. »
—Bilivus, maître-archiviste

foreign_names.name: Portale del Santuario
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}: Fai tornare una creatura bersaglio che controlli e tutte le Aure ad essa assegnate in mano ai rispettivi proprietari. Attiva questa abilità solo durante il tuo turno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Se vuoi sparire per un po', conosco un posto."
—Bilivus, maestro archivista

foreign_names.name: 聖域の門
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}：あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。それとそれにつけられているオーラすべてをオーナーの手札に戻す。この能力は、あなたのターンの間にのみ起動できる。
foreign_names.flavor:
「しばらく姿を隠したいなら、いい場所があるよ。」
――文書管理主任、ビリバス

foreign_names.name: 성소의 차원문
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}: 당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물과 그 생물에 부착된 모든 마법진을 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 이 능력은 당신의 턴에만 활성화할 수 있다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"잠시 동안 사라지고 싶다면, 내가 아는 곳이 있어."
—문서 보관의 대가, 빌리부스

foreign_names.name: Portal do Santuário
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}: Devolva a criatura alvo que você controla e cada Aura anexada a ela para a mão de seus donos. Ative esta habilidade apenas durante o seu próprio turno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Se você quiser desaparecer por um tempo, eu conheço um lugar."
— Bilivus, arquivista mestre

foreign_names.name: Портал Святилища
foreign_names.text: {1}, {T}: верните целевое существо под вашим контролем и каждую прикрепленную к нему Ауру в руки их владельцев. Активируйте эту способность только во время вашего хода.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Если тебе нужно на время исчезнуть, я знаю подходящее местечко».
— Биливус, мастер-архивариус

foreign_names.name: 庇护通道
foreign_names.text: {1}，{T}：将目标由你操控的生物与结附于其上的所有灵气各移回其拥有者手上。只能于你的回合中起动此异能。
foreign_names.flavor:
「如果你要消失一阵，我知道一个好地方。」
～书库辖员总管比利沃斯

foreign_names.name: 庇護通道
foreign_names.text: {1}，{T}：將目標由你操控的生物與結附於其上的所有靈氣各移回其擁有者手上。只能於你的回合中起動此異能。
foreign_names.flavor:
「如果你要消失一陣，我知道一個好地方。」
～書庫轄員總管比利沃斯

name: Prismite
text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor: Even its shadow is a dazzling rainbow.
original_text: {2}: Add one mana of any color.

foreign_names.name: Prismit
foreign_names.text: {2}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
foreign_names.flavor: Selbst sein Schatten schillert wie ein Regenbogen.

foreign_names.name: Prísmico
foreign_names.text: {2}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.
foreign_names.flavor: Incluso su sombra es un arcoíris resplandeciente.

foreign_names.name: Prismite
foreign_names.text: {2} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
foreign_names.flavor: Même son ombre est un arc-en-ciel éblouissant.

foreign_names.name: Prismobita
foreign_names.text: {2}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
foreign_names.flavor: Perfino la sua ombra è un arcobaleno sfolgorante.

foreign_names.name: プリズマイト
foreign_names.text: {2}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
foreign_names.flavor: 影ですらまばゆい虹色である。

foreign_names.name: 프리즈마이트
foreign_names.text: {2}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.
foreign_names.flavor: 그림자마저도 눈부신 무지개이다.

foreign_names.name: Prismita
foreign_names.text: {2}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.
foreign_names.flavor: Até a sombra dele é um arco-íris estonteante.

foreign_names.name: Призмит
foreign_names.text: {2}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета.
foreign_names.flavor: Даже его тень — ослепительно-яркая радуга.

foreign_names.name: 虹彩魔像
foreign_names.text: {2}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。
foreign_names.flavor: 它连影子都是绚丽霓虹。

foreign_names.name: 虹彩魔像
foreign_names.text: {2}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力。
foreign_names.flavor: 它連影子都是絢麗霓虹。

name: Prized Unicorn
text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.
flavor:
"Friend and foe alike are irresistibly drawn to its beauty—the good, to their lasting reward, and the evil, to their brief and painful regret."
—Vivien Reid
original_text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

rulings.text: If a creature the defending player controls can’t block Prized Unicorn for any reason (such as being tapped), then it doesn’t block Prized Unicorn. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature block Prized Unicorn, the defending player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to block.
If more than one Prized Unicorn is attacking, creatures that could block must block one Prized Unicorn, but they don’t all have to block the same Prized Unicorn.

foreign_names.name: Preziöses Einhorn
foreign_names.text: Alle Kreaturen, die das Preziöse Einhorn blocken können, tun dies.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Freunde und Feinde werden gleichermaßen unwiderstehlich von seiner Schönheit angezogen — die Feinde bereuen es kurz und heftig."
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Unicornio preciado
foreign_names.text: Todas las criaturas que puedan bloquear al Unicornio preciado lo hacen.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Su belleza atrae irresistiblemente a amigos y enemigos: a los buenos los conduce hacia una recompensa duradera; a los malvados, hacia un arrepentimiento breve y doloroso".
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Licorne prisée
foreign_names.text: Toutes les créatures capables de bloquer la Licorne prisée le font.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Amis et ennemis sont irrésistiblement attirés par sa beauté. Les bons en retirent une récompense durable, et les mauvais, un regret bref et douloureux. »
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Unicorno Stimato
foreign_names.text: Tutte le creature in grado di bloccare l'Unicorno Stimato lo fanno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Amici e nemici sono irresistibilmente attratti dalla sua bellezza: i virtuosi ne ricaveranno ricompense durature, i malvagi solo rimpianti, brevi e dolorosi."
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: 尊き一角獣
foreign_names.text: 尊き一角獣をブロックできるすべてのクリーチャーは、これをブロックする。
foreign_names.flavor:
「あの美しさは敵も味方も同じように惹きつけ、善良な者には永遠の褒賞を、邪悪な者には一瞬の後悔を与える。」
――ビビアン・リード

foreign_names.name: 희귀한 유니콘
foreign_names.text: 희귀한 유니콘을 방어할 수 있는 모든 생물은 희귀한 유니콘을 방어해야 한다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"적도 친구도 한결같이 그것의 아름다움에 이끌린다—오래도록 남을 기억이라는 점은 좋지만, 짧고 고통스러운 후회를 동반한다."
—비비안 레이드

foreign_names.name: Unicórnio Cobiçado
foreign_names.text: Todas as criaturas aptas a bloquear Unicórnio Cobiçado o fazem.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Amigos e inimigos são igualmente atraídos por sua beleza. Os bons, para sempiterna recompensa. Os maus, para um breve e doloroso arrependimento."
— Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Ценный Единорог
foreign_names.text: Все существа, способные блокировать Ценного Единорога, блокируют его.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Ни друзья, ни враги не могут устоять перед притягательной силой его красоты — добрые сердцем находят в ней вечную награду, злодеи — быстрый и болезненный конец».
— Вивьен Рейд

foreign_names.name: 珍奇独角兽
foreign_names.text: 所有能够阻挡珍奇独角兽的生物皆须阻挡之。
foreign_names.flavor:
「无论敌友都无法抗拒其华美而趋前～对于善者而言，这会是其受用终身的奖赏；而对恶者而言，这便是其短暂却又痛苦的惩罚。」
～薇薇安瑞德

foreign_names.name: 珍奇獨角獸
foreign_names.text: 所有能夠阻擋珍奇獨角獸的生物皆須阻擋之。
foreign_names.flavor:
「無論敵友都無法抗拒其華美而趨前～對於善者而言，這會是其受用終身的獎賞；而對惡者而言，這便是其短暫卻又痛苦的懲罰。」
～薇薇安瑞德

name: Prowling Caracal
flavor: A hunter in the city requires the utmost cunning to survive. It must pounce only if the kill is certain, and leave the remains where no one will see.

foreign_names.name: Lauernder Karakal
foreign_names.flavor: In Städten müssen Jäger besonders schlau sein. Sie dürfen nur angreifen, wenn die Beute gewiss ist, und müssen die Überreste verstecken, wo sie niemand findet.

foreign_names.name: Caracal rondador
foreign_names.flavor: Un cazador debe ser extremadamente astuto para sobrevivir en la ciudad. Solo debe saltar si la presa es segura... y dejar los restos donde nadie los encuentre.

foreign_names.name: Caracal rôdeur
foreign_names.flavor: En ville, un chasseur doit être particulièrement rusé pour survivre. Il n'attaque que s'il est sûr de tuer, et il laisse la dépouille de sa proie là où personne ne la verra.

foreign_names.name: Lince in Agguato
foreign_names.flavor: Per sopravvivere in città, un cacciatore deve possedere un'astuzia straordinaria per attaccare solo se è certo di uccidere e lasciare i resti dove nessuno li troverà.

foreign_names.name: うろつくカラカル
foreign_names.flavor: 狩り手が都市で生き残るには、誰よりも狡猾でなければならない。確実に殺せる場合にのみ襲撃し、痕跡は誰にも見られない場所にのみ残すのだ。

foreign_names.name: 배회하는 카라칼
foreign_names.flavor: 도시의 사냥꾼이 살아남으려면 아주 교활해야 한다. 확실하게 죽일 수 있을 때에만 달려들어야 하고, 유해는 아무도 보지 못하는 곳에 두어야 한다.

foreign_names.name: Caracal Espreitador
foreign_names.flavor: Um caçador citadino precisa da mais absoluta astúcia para sobreviver. Precisa dar o bote somente quando o abate é certo, e deixar os restos onde ninguém os veja.

foreign_names.name: Охотничий Каракал
foreign_names.flavor: Для выживания в городе охотнику требуется вся его ловкость. Он должен атаковать, только когда уверен в успехе, и прятать останки там, где их никто не найдет.

foreign_names.name: 潜行狞猫
foreign_names.flavor: 生于城市的捕猎者需深谙机敏狩猎之道方能存活：有十足把握时方才扑击，而后藏猎物遗骸于隐蔽之处。

foreign_names.name: 潛行獰貓
foreign_names.flavor: 生於城市的捕獵者需深諳機敏狩獵之道方能存活：有十足把握時方才撲擊，而後藏獵物遺骸於隱蔽之處。

name: Pulse of Murasa
text: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.
flavor: "Little flower twirl and bloom, arise from this your rocky tomb. Little warrior slash and brawl, be born again to free us all."
original_text: Return target creature or land card from a graveyard to its owner's hand. You gain 6 life.

rulings.text: If the target card is an illegal target by the time Pulse of Murasa tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain 6 life.

foreign_names.name: Puls von Murasa
foreign_names.text: Bringe eine Kreaturen- oder Länderkarte deiner Wahl aus einem Friedhof auf die Hand ihres Besitzers zurück. Du erhältst 6 Lebenspunkte dazu.
foreign_names.flavor: „Kleine Blume wachse, blühe, auf dem Grabe ohne Mühe. Kleiner Krieger kämpfe wacker, erstehe auf vom Totenacker."

foreign_names.name: Pulso de Murasa
foreign_names.text: Regresa la carta de criatura o de tierra objetivo de un cementerio a la mano de su propietario. Ganas 6 vidas.
foreign_names.flavor: "Pequeño tallo marchito y rugoso, asoma la cabeza de tu túmulo rocoso. Guerrero del bosque con ramas de musgo, revive de nuevo y líbranos del yugo".

foreign_names.name: Pulsation de Murasa
foreign_names.text: Renvoyez une carte de créature ou de terrain ciblée depuis un cimetière dans la main de son propriétaire. Vous gagnez 6 points de vie.
foreign_names.flavor: « Ondule et pousse petit végétal, élève-toi de ta tombe rocheuse. Tranche et combat petit guerrier, renais pour tous nous libérer. »

foreign_names.name: Battito di Murasa
foreign_names.text: Fai tornare una carta creatura o terra bersaglio da un cimitero in mano al suo proprietario. Guadagni 6 punti vita.
foreign_names.flavor: "Piccolo fiore, germoglia e sboccia, innalzati da questa tua tomba di roccia. Piccolo guerriero, squarcia e combatti, rinasci per liberarci tutti."

foreign_names.name: ムラーサの胎動
foreign_names.text: 墓地からクリーチャーか土地であるカード１枚を対象とし、それをオーナーの手札に戻す。あなたは６点のライフを得る。
foreign_names.flavor: 「可憐な花の千々に咲き、なれの墓より茂るごと、試練の兵よ戻り来て、共に再び戦わん。」

foreign_names.name: 무라사의 파동
foreign_names.text: 무덤에 있는 생물이나 대지 카드를 목표로 정한다. 그 카드를 소유자의 손으로 되돌린다. 당신은 생명 6점을 얻는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "작은 꽃이 빙글 돌며 꽃을 피운다. 여기 그대의 돌무덤에서 솟아난다. 작은 전사가 칼을 휘두른다. 우리를 해방하기 위해 다시 태어났도다."

foreign_names.name: Pulsação de Murasa
foreign_names.text: Devolva o card de criatura ou de terreno alvo de um cemitério para a mão de seu dono. Você ganha 6 pontos de vida.
foreign_names.flavor: "Pequena flor, brota e desabrocha. Deixa esta tumba de rocha. Pequeno guerreiro, venha lutar. Renasça para nos libertar."

foreign_names.name: Пульс Мурасы
foreign_names.text: Верните целевую карту существа или земли из кладбища в руку ее владельца. Вы получаете 6 жизней.
foreign_names.flavor: «Цветочек маленький, расти, из каменной могилы поднимись. Воитель маленький, руби, и чтобы защитить нас — вновь родись».

foreign_names.name: 姆拉撒的脉动
foreign_names.text: 将目标生物或地牌从坟墓场移回其拥有者手上。你获得6点生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 「幼枝新芳，伸展绽放，嶙峋石冢缠碧藤。幼少勇将，劈敌征战，复苏人世救众生。」

foreign_names.name: 姆拉撒的脈動
foreign_names.text: 將目標生物或地牌從墳墓場移回其擁有者手上。你獲得6點生命。
foreign_names.flavor: 「幼枝新芳，伸展綻放，嶙峋石塚纏碧藤。幼少勇將，劈敵征戰，復蘇人世救眾生。」

name: Pyroclastic Elemental
text: {1}{R}{R}: Pyroclastic Elemental deals 1 damage to target player.
flavor:
"Whoever thought of making mobile volcanoes was a genius."
—Chandra Nalaar
original_text: {1}{R}{R}: Pyroclastic Elemental deals 1 damage to target player.

foreign_names.name: Pyroklastisches Elementar
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}: Das Pyroklastische Elementar fügt einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Wer auch immer diese wandelnden Vulkane erfunden hat, war ein Genie."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreign_names.name: Elemental piroclástico
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}: El Elemental piroclástico hace 1 punto de daño al jugador objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Quien tuvo la idea de crear volcanes móviles era un genio".
—Chandra Nalaar

foreign_names.name: Élémental pyroclastique
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R} : L'Élémental pyroclastique inflige 1 blessure à un joueur ciblé.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Quiconque a pensé à rendre les volcans mobiles était un génie. »
—Chandra Nalaàr

foreign_names.name: Elementale Piroclastico
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}: L'Elementale Piroclastico infligge 1 danno a un giocatore bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Chiunque abbia inventato i vulcani portatili era un genio."
—Chandra Nalaar

foreign_names.name: 火砕の精霊
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}：プレイヤー１人を対象とする。火砕の精霊はそれに１点のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.flavor:
「誰だか知らないけど、動く火山を考え出した人って天才ね。」
――チャンドラ・ナラー

foreign_names.name: 쇄설암 정령
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 쇄설암 정령은 그 플레이어에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"이동 가능한 화산을 만들겠다고 생각한 사람은 천재였던 게 틀림없어."
—찬드라 날라르

foreign_names.name: Elemental Piroclástico
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}: Elemental Piroclástico causa 1 ponto de dano ao jogador alvo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Quem quer que tenha pensado em fazer vulcões móveis era um gênio."
— Chandra Nalaar

foreign_names.name: Пирокластический Элементаль
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}: Пирокластический Элементаль наносит 1 повреждение целевому игроку.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Тот, кто придумал делать ходячие вулканы, был настоящим гением».
— Чандра Налаар

foreign_names.name: 熔屑元素
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}：熔屑元素对目标牌手造成1点伤害。
foreign_names.flavor:
「想到带上火山一起走的人可真是个天才。」
～茜卓纳拉

foreign_names.name: 熔屑元素
foreign_names.text: {1}{R}{R}：熔屑元素對目標玩家造成1點傷害。
foreign_names.flavor:
「想到帶上火山一起走的人可真是個天才。」
～茜卓納拉

name: Rabid Bite
text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
flavor:
"You should have seen the look on *both* their faces."
—Morkamp, Lambholt innkeeper
original_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

rulings.text: If either creature is an illegal target as Rabid Bite tries to resolve, the creature you control won’t deal damage.

foreign_names.name: Tollwütiger Biss
foreign_names.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du kontrollierst, fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl, die du nicht kontrollierst, Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Du hättest den Gesichtsausdruck von ihnen *beiden* sehen sollen."
—Morkamp, Wirt von Lammholt

foreign_names.name: Mordisco rabioso
foreign_names.text: La criatura objetivo que controlas hace una cantidad de daño igual a su fuerza a la criatura objetivo que no controlas.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Tendrías que haber visto las caras que *ambos* pusieron".
—Morkamp, tabernero de Lambholt

foreign_names.name: Morsure enragée
foreign_names.text: Une créature ciblée que vous contrôlez inflige un nombre de blessures égal à sa force à une créature ciblée que vous ne contrôlez pas.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Vous auriez dû voir leur tête**. »
—Morkamp, tavernier de Lambholt

foreign_names.name: Morso Rabbioso
foreign_names.text: Una creatura bersaglio che controlli infligge danno pari alla sua forza a una creatura bersaglio che non controlli.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Avreste dovuto vedere l'espressione su *entrambe* le loro facce."
—Morkamp, locandiere di Lambholt

foreign_names.name: 狂気の一咬み
foreign_names.text: あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャー１体と、あなたがコントロールしていないクリーチャー１体を対象とする。その前者はその後者に、自身のパワーに等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.flavor:
「両方の顔を見比べるべきだったな。」**
――ラムホルトの宿主、モーカンプ

foreign_names.name: 맹렬한 물어뜯기
foreign_names.text: 당신이 조종하는 생물과 당신이 조종하지 않는 생물을 각각 목표로 정한다. 첫 번째 목표는 두 번째 목표에게 자신의 공격력만큼 피해를 입힌다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"그들 *둘 다*의 얼굴 표정을 봤어야 해."
—램홀트 여관주인, 모르캄프

foreign_names.name: Mordida Rábica
foreign_names.text: A criatura alvo que você controla causa dano igual ao seu poder à criatura alvo que você não controla.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Você devia ter visto a expressão em *ambas* as caras."
— Morkamp, estalajadeiro de Lambholt

foreign_names.name: Бешеный Укус
foreign_names.text: Целевое существо под вашим контролем наносит повреждения, равные своей силе, целевому существу не под вашим контролем.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Видел бы ты *обе* их рожи!»
— Моркамп, ламбхольтский трактирщик

foreign_names.name: 狂疾啃咬
foreign_names.text: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。
foreign_names.flavor:
「你真应该看一下*双方*脸上的表情。」
～羊屯旅店主莫坎普

foreign_names.name: 狂疾啃咬
foreign_names.text: 目標由你操控的生物對目標不由你操控的生物造成傷害，其數量等同於前者的力量。
foreign_names.flavor:
「你真應該看一下*雙方*臉上的表情。」
～羊屯旅店主莫坎普

name: Raise the Alarm
text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
flavor: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.
original_text: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

foreign_names.name: Alarmschlagen
foreign_names.text: Erzeuge zwei 1/1 weiße Soldat-Kreaturenspielsteine.
foreign_names.flavor: Wie Blinzeln oder Atmen ist die Reaktion auf einen Alarm eine unwillkürliche Handlung.

foreign_names.name: Dar la alarma
foreign_names.text: Crea dos fichas de criatura Soldado blancas 1/1.
foreign_names.flavor: Al igual que el parpadeo o la respiración, responder a una alarma es un reflejo involuntario.

foreign_names.name: Sonner l'alerte
foreign_names.text: Créez deux jetons de créature 1/1 blanche Soldat.
foreign_names.flavor: Tout comme cligner des yeux ou respirer, réagir à une alerte est un réflexe involontaire.

foreign_names.name: Dare l'Allarme
foreign_names.text: Crea due pedine creatura Soldato 1/1 bianche.
foreign_names.flavor: Reagire a un allarme è un riflesso involontario, come sbattere le palpebre o respirare.

foreign_names.name: 急報
foreign_names.text: 白の１/１の兵士・クリーチャー・トークンを２体生成する。
foreign_names.flavor: 瞬きや息をするのと同じように、急報に反応することは不随意の反射である。

foreign_names.name: 경보 발동
foreign_names.text: 1/1 백색 병사 생물 토큰 두 개를 만든다.
foreign_names.flavor: 경보에 반응하는 건 눈을 깜박이거나 숨을 쉬는 것과 같은 본능적인 반사 작용이다.

foreign_names.name: Soar o Alarme
foreign_names.text: Crie duas fichas de criatura brancas 1/1 do tipo Soldado.
foreign_names.flavor: Assim como piscar e respirar, responder a um alarme é um reflexo involuntário.

foreign_names.name: Поднять Тревогу
foreign_names.text: Создайте две фишки существа 1/1 белый Солдат.
foreign_names.flavor: Подняться по тревоге для них — непроизвольная реакция, как моргание или дыхание.

foreign_names.name: 扬起警报
foreign_names.text: 派出两个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 响应警报就如眨眼和呼吸一样，是一种下意识的反应。

foreign_names.name: 揚起警報
foreign_names.text: 派出兩個1/1白色士兵衍生生物。
foreign_names.flavor: 回應警報就如眨眼和呼吸一樣，是一種下意識的反應。

name: Rapacious Dragon
text:
Flying
When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")
flavor:
"Surely it won't notice if I take—"
—Theria the Sly, last words
original_text: Flying When Rapacious Dragon enters the battlefield, create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.")

foreign_names.name: Schatzhortender Drache
foreign_names.text:
Fliegend
Wenn der Schatzhortende Drache ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge zwei Schatz-Spielsteine. (Sie sind Artefakte mit „{T}, opfere dieses Artefakt: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.")
foreign_names.flavor:
„Er wird es sicher nicht merken, wenn ich nur diesen einen …"
—Theria die Gerissene, letzte Worte

foreign_names.name: Dragón avaro
foreign_names.text:
Vuela.
Cuando el Dragón avaro entre al campo de batalla, crea dos fichas de Tesoro. (Son artefactos con "{T}, sacrificar este artefacto: Agrega un maná de cualquier color".)
foreign_names.flavor:
"Seguro que no se dará cuenta si le robo un poqui...".
—Theria la Sagaz, últimas palabras

foreign_names.name: Dragon insatiable
foreign_names.text:
Vol
Quand le Dragon insatiable arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez deux jetons Trésor. (Ce sont des artefacts avec « {T}, sacrifiez cet artefact : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix. »)
foreign_names.flavor:
« Il ne remarquera sûrement pas si je prends... »
—Théria la maligne, derniers mots

foreign_names.name: Drago Bramoso
foreign_names.text:
Volare
Quando il Drago Bramoso entra nel campo di battaglia, crea due pedine Tesoro. (Sono artefatti con: "{T}, Sacrifica questo artefatto: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore".)
foreign_names.flavor:
"Di certo non si accorgerà se prendo..."
—Theria l'Astuta, ultime parole

foreign_names.name: 多欲なドラゴン
foreign_names.text:
飛行
多欲なドラゴンが戦場に出たとき、宝物・トークンを２つ生成する。（それらは、「{T}, このアーティファクトを生け贄に捧げる：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。」を持つアーティファクトである。）
foreign_names.flavor:
「これくらい頂いても、あいつはきっと気づきやしな……」
――小狡いサリアの最後の言葉

foreign_names.name: 욕심 많은 용
foreign_names.text:
비행
욕심 많은 용이 전장에 들어올 때, 보물 토큰 두 개를 만든다. (그 토큰들은 "{T}, 이 마법물체를 희생한다: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다."를 가진 마법물체들이다.)
foreign_names.flavor:
"내가 이걸 가져가도 저건 절대로 모를 거—"
—비열한 테리아, 마지막 유언

foreign_names.name: Dragão Edaz
foreign_names.text:
Voar
Quando Dragão Edaz entrar no campo de batalha, crie duas fichas de Tesouro. (Elas são artefatos com "{T}, sacrifique este artefato: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.")
foreign_names.flavor:
"Com certeza ele nem vai notar se eu pegar..."
— últimas palavras de Theria, a Astuta

foreign_names.name: Ненасытный Дракон
foreign_names.text:
Полет
Когда Ненасытный Дракон выходит на поле битвы, создайте две фишки Клада. (Это артефакты со способностью «{T}, пожертвуйте этот артефакт: добавьте одну ману любого цвета».)
foreign_names.flavor:
«Он точно не заметит, если я возьму...»
— Терия Коварная, последние слова

foreign_names.name: 贪宝巨龙
foreign_names.text:
飞行
当贪宝巨龙进战场时，派出两个珍宝衍生物。（珍宝衍生物是具有「{T}，牺牲此神器：加一点任意颜色的法术力」的神器。）
foreign_names.flavor:
「我拿走几个它肯定也不会发～」
～妙手赛莉娅的遗言

foreign_names.name: 貪寶巨龍
foreign_names.text:
飛行
當貪寶巨龍進戰場時，派出兩個珍寶衍生物。（珍寶衍生物是具有「{T}，犧牲此神器：加一點任意顏色的魔法力」的神器。）
foreign_names.flavor:
「我拿走幾個牠肯定也不會發～」
～妙手賽莉婭的遺言

name: Reckless Air Strike
text:
Choose one —
• Reckless Air Strike deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.
flavor: "I have a *great* idea!"
original_text:
Choose one —
• Reckless Air Strike deals 3 damage to target creature with flying.
• Destroy target artifact.

foreign_names.name: Verwegener Luftangriff
foreign_names.text:
Bestimme eines —
• Der Verwegene Luftangriff fügt einer fliegenden Kreatur deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
• Zerstöre ein Artefakt deiner Wahl.
foreign_names.flavor: „Ich habe eine *großartige* Idee!"

foreign_names.name: Ataque aéreo temerario
foreign_names.text:
Elige uno:
• El Ataque aéreo temerario hace 3 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo con la habilidad de volar.
• Destruye el artefacto objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor: "¡Tengo una idea *genial*!".

foreign_names.name: Raid aérien téméraire
foreign_names.text:
Choisissez l'un —
• Le Raid aérien téméraire inflige 3 blessures à une créature avec le vol ciblée.
• Détruisez l'artefact ciblé.
foreign_names.flavor: « J'ai une idée *géniale* ! »

foreign_names.name: Incursione Aerea Avventata
foreign_names.text:
Scegli uno —
• L'Incursione Aerea Avventata infligge 3 danni a una creatura bersaglio con volare.
• Distruggi un artefatto bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor: "Ho un'idea *fantastica*!"

foreign_names.name: 無謀な空襲
foreign_names.text:
以下から１つを選ぶ。
• 飛行を持つクリーチャー１体を対象とする。無謀な空襲はそれに３点のダメージを与える。
• アーティファクト１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreign_names.flavor: 「*すごい*こと考えた！」

foreign_names.name: 무모한 공중 강습
foreign_names.text:
하나를 선택한다 —
• 비행을 가진 생물을 목표로 정한다. 무모한 공중 강습은 그 생물에게 피해 3점을 입힌다.
• 마법물체를 목표로 정한다. 그 마법물체를 파괴한다.
foreign_names.flavor: "내게 *멋진* 생각이 있어!"

foreign_names.name: Ataque Aéreo Temerário
foreign_names.text:
Escolha um —
• Ataque Aéreo Temerário causa 3 pontos de dano à criatura alvo com voar.
• Destrua o artefato alvo.
foreign_names.flavor: "Tive uma ideia *genial*!"

foreign_names.name: Безрассудный Воздушный Налет
foreign_names.text:
Выберите одно —
• Безрассудный Воздушный Налет наносит 3 повреждения целевому существу с Полетом.
• Уничтожьте целевой артефакт.
foreign_names.flavor: «У меня *отличная* идея!»

foreign_names.name: 鲁莽空袭
foreign_names.text:
选择一项～
•鲁莽空袭对目标具飞行异能的生物造成3点伤害。
•消灭目标神器。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我有一个*绝妙*的主意！」

foreign_names.name: 魯莽空襲
foreign_names.text:
選擇一項～
•魯莽空襲對目標具飛行異能的生物造成3點傷害。
•消滅目標神器。
foreign_names.flavor: 「我有一個*絕妙*的主意！」

name: Reduce to Ashes
text: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavor:
"Before they can go to their final rest, the wicked must be purified by fire."
—Harra the Adjudicator
original_text: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.

rulings.text: The replacement effect of Reduce to Ashes will exile the target creature if it would die this turn for any reason, not just due to lethal damage.

foreign_names.name: Einäschern
foreign_names.text: Einäschern fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu. Falls die Kreatur in diesem Zug sterben würde, schicke sie stattdessen ins Exil.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Alles Böse muss durch Feuer geläutert werden, bevor es seine letzte Ruhe finden kann."
—Harra der Aburteiler

foreign_names.name: Reducir a cenizas
foreign_names.text: Reducir a cenizas hace 5 puntos de daño a la criatura objetivo. Si esa criatura fuera a morir este turno, en vez de eso, exíliala.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Antes de dejarlos partir hacia su descanso eterno, los malvados deben ser purificados por el fuego".
—Harra el Sentenciador

foreign_names.name: Réduire en cendres
foreign_names.text: Réduire en cendres inflige 5 blessures à une créature ciblée. Si cette créature devait mourir ce tour-ci, exilez-la à la place.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Avant de pouvoir goûter au repos éternel, les malfaisants doivent être purifiés par le feu. »
—Harra l'adjudicateur

foreign_names.name: Ridurre in Cenere
foreign_names.text: Ridurre in Cenere infligge 5 danni a una creatura bersaglio. Se quella creatura sta per morire in questo turno, invece esiliala.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Prima di poter giungere al riposo finale, i malvagi devono essere purificati dal fuoco."
—Harra il Giudice

foreign_names.name: 灰と化す
foreign_names.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。灰と化すはそれに５点のダメージを与える。このターン、そのクリーチャーが死亡するなら、代わりにそれを追放する。
foreign_names.flavor:
「血塗られた者は、最後の眠りを得る前に、火で浄化されなければならない。」
――審判員ハーラ

foreign_names.name: 완전 전소
foreign_names.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 완전 전소는 그 생물에게 피해 5점을 입힌다. 그 생물이 이 턴에 죽게 된다면, 대신 추방한다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"그것들이 마지막 안식에 들어가기 전에, 사악함을 불로 정화해야만 한다."
—심판관 하라

foreign_names.name: Reduzir a Cinzas
foreign_names.text: Reduzir a Cinzas causa 5 pontos de dano à criatura alvo. Se aquela criatura for morrer neste turno, em vez disso, exile-a.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Antes de terem seu descanso final, os perversos precisam ser purificados pelo fogo."
— Harra, o Árbitro

foreign_names.name: Превращение в Прах
foreign_names.text: Превращение в Прах наносит 5 повреждений целевому существу. Если то существо должно умереть в этом ходу, изгоните его вместо этого.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Прежде чем обрести последний покой, нечестивые должны пройти очищение огнем».
— Арбитр Харра

foreign_names.name: 烧成灰烬
foreign_names.text: 烧成灰烬对目标生物造成5点伤害。如果本回合中该生物将死去，则改为将它放逐。
foreign_names.flavor:
「在恶者终享安息之前，必须以火净化。」
～裁决者哈拉

foreign_names.name: 燒成灰燼
foreign_names.text: 燒成灰燼對目標生物造成5點傷害。如果本回合中該生物將死去，則改為將它放逐。
foreign_names.flavor:
「在惡者終享安息之前，必須以火淨化。」
～裁決者哈拉

name: Renowned Weaponsmith
text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
original_text:
{T}: Add {C}{C}. Spend this mana only to cast artifact spells or activate abilities of artifacts.
{U}, {T}: Search your library for a card named Heart-Piercer Bow or Vial of Dragonfire, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities, such as equip, are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. You can’t spend mana added by this ability to pay costs of triggered abilities of artifacts such as the first ability of Chandra’s Regulator.
The mana generated by Renowned Weaponsmith’s first ability can’t be spent to activate abilities of artifact sources that aren’t on the battlefield.

foreign_names.name: Angesehener Waffenschmied
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Erzeuge {C}{C}. Verwende dieses Mana nur, um Artefaktzauber zu wirken oder Fähigkeiten von Artefakten zu aktivieren.
{U}, {T}: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Karte namens Herzstecherbogen oder Phiole mit Drachenfeuer, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek.

foreign_names.name: Armero insigne
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Agrega {C}{C}. Usa este maná solo para lanzar hechizos de artefacto o activar habilidades de artefactos.
{U}, {T}: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta llamada Arco perforacorazones o Frasco de fuegodragón, muéstrala, ponla en tu mano y luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreign_names.name: Forgeur d'armes réputé
foreign_names.text:
{T} : Ajoutez {C}{C}. Ne dépensez ce mana que pour lancer des sorts d'artefact ou activer des capacités d'artefact.
{U}, {T} : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte appelée Arc du perce-cœur ou Fiole de feu des dragons, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main, puis mélangez votre bibliothèque.

foreign_names.name: Armaiolo Rinomato
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Aggiungi {C}{C}. Spendi questo mana solo per lanciare magie artefatto o attivare abilità di artefatti.
{U}, {T}: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta chiamata Arco Trafiggicuore o Fiala di Fuoco Draconico, rivelala, aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreign_names.name: 名高い武器職人
foreign_names.text:
{T}：{C}{C}を加える。このマナは、アーティファクト・呪文を唱えるためか、アーティファクトの能力を起動するためにのみ使用できる。
{U}, {T}：あなたのライブラリーから「心臓貫きの弓」か「龍火の薬瓶」という名前のカード１枚を探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。

foreign_names.name: 유명한 무기장인
foreign_names.text:
{T}: {C}{C}를 추가한다. 이 마나는 마법물체 주문을 발동하거나 마법물체의 능력을 활성화하는 데에만 사용할 수 있다.
{U}, {T}: 당신의 서고에서 이름이 심장을 관통하는 활 또는 용의 불을 담은 병인 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개한 후 당신의 손으로 가져간다. 그러고 나서 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreign_names.name: Armeiro Renomado
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Adicione {C}{C}. Gaste este mana somente para conjurar mágicas de artefato ou ativar habilidades de artefatos.
{U}, {T}: Procure um card com o nome Arco Perfurador de Corações ou Frasco de Fogo Dragônico em seu grimório, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e depois embaralhe seu grimório.

foreign_names.name: Знаменитый Оружейник
foreign_names.text:
{T}: добавьте {C}{C}. Тратьте эту ману только на разыгрывание заклинаний артефактов или на активацию способностей артефактов.
{U}, {T}: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту с именем Лук Пронзателя Сердец или Флакон Драконьего Огня, покажите ее, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreign_names.name: 享誉兵匠
foreign_names.text:
{T}：加{C}{C}。此法术力只能用来施放神器咒语，或是起动神器的异能。
{U}，{T}：从你的牌库中搜寻一张名称为穿心弓或龙炎瓶的牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreign_names.name: 享譽兵匠
foreign_names.text:
{T}：加{C}{C}。此魔法力只能用來施放神器咒語，或是起動神器的異能。
{U}，{T}：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張名稱為穿心弓或龍炎瓶的牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

name: Repeated Reverberation
text: When you next cast an instant spell, cast a sorcery spell, or activate a loyalty ability this turn, copy that spell or ability twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.
flavor: It's in the nature of fire to grow.
original_text: When you next cast an instant spell, cast a sorcery spell, or activate a loyalty ability this turn, copy that spell or ability twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.

rulings.text: If you cast one Repeated Reverberation after another, you’ll copy the second Repeated Reverberation twice. Each resolves, creating three delayed triggered abilities. The next spell you cast or loyalty ability you activate after that will be copied six times. If that spell is also a Repeated Reverberation, the following spell or ability will be copied fourteen times. A fourth Repeated Reverberation will copy the next spell or ability thirty times. Reverberations repeated beyond that shall be left as an exercise for the reader.
Repeated Reverberation’s ability will copy any instant or sorcery spell or loyalty ability, not just one with targets.

Copies are created even if the spell or ability that caused Repeated Reverberation’s ability to trigger has been countered by the time that ability resolves. The copies resolve before the original spell or ability.

The copies will have the same targets as the spell or ability they’re copying unless you choose new ones. You may change any number of the targets, including all of them or none of them. The new targets must be legal.
If the spell that’s copied is modal (that is, it says “Choose one —” or the like), the copies will have the same mode or modes. You can’t choose different ones.
If the spell or ability that’s copied has an X whose value was determined as it was cast, the copies will have the same value of X.

You can’t choose to pay any additional costs for the copies. However, effects based on any additional costs that were paid for the original spell are copied as though those same costs were paid for the copies too.

The copies made by Repeated Reverberation’s ability are created on the stack, so they’re not “cast” or “activated.” Abilities that trigger when a player casts a spell or activate an ability don’t trigger.
Copying a loyalty ability doesn’t add or remove loyalty counters from any object.

foreign_names.name: Wiederholter Widerhall
foreign_names.text: Wenn du das nächste Mal in diesem Zug einen Spontanzauber oder eine Hexerei wirkst oder eine Loyalitätsfähigkeit aktivierst, kopiere jenen Zauberspruch oder jene Fähigkeit zweimal. Du kannst neue Ziele für die Kopien bestimmen.
foreign_names.flavor: Zu wachsen liegt in der Natur des Feuers.

foreign_names.name: Reverberación repetida
foreign_names.text: Cuando lances el próximo hechizo de instantáneo o de conjuro o actives una habilidad de lealtad este turno, copia ese hechizo o habilidad dos veces. Puedes elegir nuevos objetivos para las copias.
foreign_names.flavor: Propagarse forma parte de la naturaleza del fuego.

foreign_names.name: Rayonnement répétitif
foreign_names.text: Quand vous lancez pour la prochaine fois ce tour-ci un sort d'éphémère, un sort de rituel, ou que vous activez pour la prochaine fois ce tour-ci une capacité de loyauté, copiez ce sort ou cette capacité deux fois. Vous pouvez choisir de nouvelles cibles pour ces copies.
foreign_names.flavor: Il est dans la nature du feu de croître.

foreign_names.name: Riverbero Reiterato
foreign_names.text: La prossima volta che lanci una magia istantaneo, lanci una magia stregoneria o attivi un'abilità di fedeltà in questo turno, copia quella magia o abilità due volte. Puoi scegliere nuovi bersagli per le copie.
foreign_names.flavor: Crescere è nella natura del fuoco.

foreign_names.name: 反復する反響
foreign_names.text: このターン、あなたが次にインスタント・呪文を唱えるかソーサリー・呪文を唱えるか忠誠度能力を起動したとき、その呪文や能力を２回コピーする。あなたはそれらのコピーの新しい対象を選んでもよい。
foreign_names.flavor: 火というのは大きくなるものだ。

foreign_names.name: 반복되는 반향
foreign_names.text: 당신이 이번 턴에 다음으로 순간마법 주문 또는 집중마법 주문을 발동하거나 충성 능력을 활성화할 때, 그 주문 또는 능력을 두 번 복사한다. 당신은 그 복사본들의 목표를 새로 정할 수 있다.
foreign_names.flavor: 더욱 커지는 것은 불꽃의 본성이다.

foreign_names.name: Reverberação Repetida
foreign_names.text: Na próxima vez que você conjurar uma mágica instantânea ou um feitiço ou ativar uma habilidade de lealdade neste turno, copie aquela mágica ou habilidade duas vezes. Você pode escolher novos alvos para as cópias.
foreign_names.flavor: Crescer é da natureza do fogo.

foreign_names.name: Повторяющийся Рокот
foreign_names.text: Когда вы в следующий раз в этом ходу разыгрываете мгновенное заклинание, разыгрываете заклинание волшебства или активируете способность верности, скопируйте то заклинание или способность дважды. Вы можете выбрать новые цели для тех копий.
foreign_names.flavor: Расти — в природе огня.

foreign_names.name: 再三回响
foreign_names.text: 本回合中，当你下一次施放瞬间咒语，施放法术咒语或起动忠诚异能时，将该咒语或异能复制两次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。
foreign_names.flavor: 火自然是越烧越旺。

foreign_names.name: 再三迴響
foreign_names.text: 本回合中，當你下一次施放瞬間咒語，施放巫術咒語或起動忠誠異能時，將該咒語或異能複製兩次。你可以為每個複製品選擇新的目標。
foreign_names.flavor: 火自然是越燒越旺。

name: Retributive Wand
text:
{3}, {T}: Retributive Wand deals 1 damage to any target.
When Retributive Wand is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to any target.
flavor:
"The last blast is the biggest."
—Sargis Haz, artificer
original_text:
{3}, {T}: Retributive Wand deals 1 damage to any target.
When Retributive Wand is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, it deals 5 damage to any target.

rulings.text: Retributive Wand’s last ability doesn’t allow you to sacrifice it whenever you wish. You’ll need to use another spell or ability to break it.

foreign_names.name: Vergeltungsstab
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}: Der Vergeltungsstab fügt einem Ziel deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.
Wenn der Vergeltungsstab aus dem Spiel auf einen Friedhof gelegt wird, fügt er einem Ziel deiner Wahl 5 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Die letzte Entladung ist die größte."
—Sargis Haz, Tüftler

foreign_names.name: Varita retributiva
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}: La Varita retributiva hace 1 punto de daño a cualquier objetivo.
Cuando la Varita retributiva vaya a un cementerio desde el campo de batalla, hace 5 puntos de daño a cualquier objetivo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"El último estallido es el más fuerte".
—Sargis Haz, artífice

foreign_names.name: Baguette vindicative
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T} : La Baguette vindicative inflige 1 blessure à n'importe quelle cible.
Quand la Baguette vindicative est mise dans un cimetière depuis le champ de bataille, elle inflige 5 blessures à n'importe quelle cible.
foreign_names.flavor:
« La dernière explosion est la plus grosse. »
—Sargis Haz, artificier

foreign_names.name: Bacchetta Punitiva
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}: La Bacchetta Punitiva infligge 1 danno a un qualsiasi bersaglio.
Quando la Bacchetta Punitiva viene messa in un cimitero dal campo di battaglia, infligge 5 danni a un qualsiasi bersaglio.
foreign_names.flavor:
"L'ultima scarica è la più forte."
—Sargis Haz, artefice

foreign_names.name: 報復のワンド
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}：クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。報復のワンドはそれに１点のダメージを与える。
報復のワンドが戦場から墓地に置かれたとき、クリーチャー１体かプレインズウォーカー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。報復のワンドはそれに５点のダメージを与える。
foreign_names.flavor:
「最後の一撃が一番強力よ。」
――工匠、サルギス・ハズ

foreign_names.name: 인과응보의 지팡이
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}: 원하는 목표를 정한다. 인과응보의 지팡이는 그 목표에게 피해 1점을 입힌다.
인과응보의 지팡이가 전장에서 무덤에 놓일 때, 원하는 목표를 정한다. 인과응보의 지팡이는 그 목표에게 피해 5점을 입힌다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"마지막 폭발이 가장 큰 폭발이지."
—기능공, 사르기스 하즈

foreign_names.name: Varinha Retribuidora
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}: Varinha Retribuidora causa 1 ponto de dano a qualquer alvo.
Quando Varinha Retribuidora é colocada num cemitério vinda do campo de batalha, ela causa 5 pontos de dano a qualquer alvo.
foreign_names.flavor:
"A última explosão é a maior."
— Sargis Haz, artesão

foreign_names.name: Жезл Воздаяния
foreign_names.text:
{3}, {T}: Жезл Воздаяния наносит 1 повреждение любой цели.
Когда Жезл Воздаяния попадает с поля битвы на кладбище, он наносит 5 повреждений любой цели.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Последний разряд — самый мощный».
— Саргис Хаз, изобретатель

foreign_names.name: 报复法杖
foreign_names.text:
{3}，{T}：报复法杖对任意一个目标造成1点伤害。
当报复法杖从战场进入坟墓场时，它对任意一个目标造成5点伤害。
foreign_names.flavor:
「最后一声最响。」
～神器师莎琪亥

rulings.text: If a multicolored creature you control leaves the graveyard after it dies but before the delayed triggered ability resolves, it will not return to its owner’s hand.

name: Rule of Law

rulings.text: Rule of Law looks at the entire turn to see if a player has cast a spell, even if Rule of Law wasn’t on the battlefield when that spell was cast. Notably, you can’t cast Rule of Law and then cast another spell during the same turn.
If you cast a spell that was countered, you can’t cast another spell during the same turn.

name: Salvager of Ruin
text: Sacrifice Salvager of Ruin: Choose target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand.
flavor:
"The next model should be able to achieve a rescue without self-destruction."
—Sargis Haz, artificer
original_text: Sacrifice Salvager of Ruin: Choose target permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield this turn. Return it to your hand.

rulings.text: Because targets are chosen for activated abilities before costs (such as “Sacrifice Salvager of Ruin”) are paid, Salvager of Ruin’s ability can’t target itself.
A permanent card is an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker card.
Salvager of Ruin’s ability can target a permanent card in your graveyard that was put there from the battlefield before Salvager of Ruin entered the battlefield during the same turn.
Permanent spells that were countered earlier in the turn never entered the battlefield, so they are not legal targets for Salvager of Ruin’s ability.

name: Savage Gorger
text:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Savage Gorger. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavor: "I have no patience for sipping blood from crystal goblets. I want to bite and tear."
original_text: Flying At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Savage Gorger. (Damage causes loss of life.)

rulings.text: Savage Gorger looks at your entire turn to determine whether an opponent lost any life. It doesn’t matter how many opponents lost life or how much life they lost, only whether any of them did. It also doesn’t matter whether Savage Gorger was on the battlefield when they lost life.
It doesn’t matter whether an opponent has less life than they started the turn with. If a player lost 4 life but also gained 6 life, that player still lost 4 life.
A player loses life if they pay life.

rulings.text: Scampering Scorcher’s ability affects only Elementals you control as the ability resolves (after creating the Elemental tokens). This means that those tokens and Scampering Scorcher itself will gain haste. Elementals you begin to control later in the turn won’t gain haste.

original_text: Whenever Scorch Spitter attacks, it deals 1 damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.

rulings.text: The damage Scorch Spitter deals as its ability resolves isn’t combat damage.

If the planeswalker Scorch Spitter is attacking is reduced to 0 loyalty from the damage caused by its ability, Scorch Spitter continues to attack. It can be blocked, and it won’t deal any combat damage if it’s not blocked.

foreign_names.text: 每当炙焰喷吐蜥攻击时，它对所攻击之牌手或鹏洛客造成1点伤害。
foreign_names.flavor:
「没错，她确实很烦人。但至少我的茶不会凉了。」
～旅店主马兰法斯瓦

foreign_names.name: 炙焰噴吐蜥
foreign_names.text: 每當炙焰噴吐蜥攻擊時，它對所攻擊之玩家或鵬洛客造成1點傷害。
foreign_names.flavor:
「沒錯，她確實很煩人。但至少我的茶不會涼了。」
～旅店主馬蘭法斯瓦

name: Scoured Barrens
text:
Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.
original_text:
Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield tapped.
When Scoured Barrens enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}.

foreign_names.name: Verlassene Ödnis
foreign_names.text:
Die Verlassene Ödnis kommt getappt ins Spiel.
Wenn die Verlassene Ödnis ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.
{T}: Erzeuge {W} oder {B}.

foreign_names.name: Yermos desérticos
foreign_names.text:
Los Yermos desérticos entran al campo de batalla girados.
Cuando los Yermos desérticos entren al campo de batalla, ganas 1 vida.
{T}: Agrega {W} o {B}.

foreign_names.name: Landes érodées
foreign_names.text:
Les Landes érodées arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées.
Quand les Landes érodées arrivent sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.
{T} : Ajoutez {W} ou {B}.

foreign_names.name: Distese Desolate
foreign_names.text:
Le Distese Desolate entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate.
Quando le Distese Desolate entrano nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 1 punto vita.
{T}: Aggiungi {W} o {B}.

foreign_names.name: 磨かれたやせ地
foreign_names.text:
磨かれたやせ地はタップ状態で戦場に出る。
磨かれたやせ地が戦場に出たとき、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
{T}：{W}か{B}を加える。

foreign_names.name: 척박한 황무지
foreign_names.text:
척박한 황무지는 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
척박한 황무지가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생명 1점을 얻는다.
{T}: {W} 또는 {B}를 추가한다.

foreign_names.name: Desertos Calcinados
foreign_names.text:
Desertos Calcinados entra no campo de batalha virado.
Quando Desertos Calcinados entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.
{T}: Adicione {W} ou {B}.

foreign_names.name: Выжженные Пустоши
foreign_names.text:
Выжженные Пустоши выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
Когда Выжженные Пустоши выходят на поле битвы, вы получаете 1 жизнь.
{T}: добавьте {W} или {B}.

foreign_names.name: 侵蚀荒漠
foreign_names.text:
侵蚀荒漠须横置进战场。
当侵蚀荒漠进战场时，你获得1点生命。
{T}：加{W}或{B}。

foreign_names.name: 侵蝕荒漠
foreign_names.text:
侵蝕荒漠須橫置進戰場。
當侵蝕荒漠進戰場時，你獲得1點生命。
{T}：加{W}或{B}。

name: Scuttlemutt
text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.
flavor: With five lenses on its "head," it sees the world in a range of colors beyond ordinary perception.
original_text:
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Target creature becomes the color or colors of your choice until end of turn.

rulings.text: You must choose one or more of the five colors of Magic while resolving Scuttlemutt’s last ability. You can’t choose “artifact,” “colorless,” or “chartreuse.”
The target creature has only the colors Scuttlemutt gives it—Scuttlemutt’s ability overwrites any previous colors the creature had.

In the Commander variant, the color identities of cards are determined as the game begins. Changing the colors of a player’s commander doesn’t affect its color identity or the cards that can be legally included in the deck.

foreign_names.name: Hoppeltrottel
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Erzeuge ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe.
{T}: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl hat bis zum Ende des Zuges eine oder mehrere Farben, die du bestimmst.
foreign_names.flavor: Mit fünf optischen Linsen auf seinem „Kopf" sieht er ein Farbspektrum, dass den meisten Lebewesen verborgen bleibt.

foreign_names.name: Canasta simplona
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Agrega un maná de cualquier color.
{T}: La criatura objetivo es del color o colores de tu elección hasta el final del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Con las cinco lentes de la "cabeza", ve el mundo en una gama de colores que va más allá de nuestra percepción.

foreign_names.name: Troussecabot
foreign_names.text:
{T} : Ajoutez un mana de la couleur de votre choix.
{T} : La créature ciblée devient de la ou des couleurs de votre choix jusqu'à la fin du tour.
foreign_names.flavor: Grâce aux cinq lentilles placées sur sa « tête », il voit le monde dans une variété de couleurs qui dépasse la perception ordinaire.

foreign_names.name: Sommozzatore Fedele
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Aggiungi un mana di un qualsiasi colore.
{T}: Una creatura bersaglio diventa di uno o più colori a tua scelta fino alla fine del turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Con cinque lenti sulla "testa", vede il mondo in una gamma di colori oltre la normale percezione.

foreign_names.name: 小走り犬
foreign_names.text:
{T}：好きな色１色のマナ１点を加える。
{T}：クリーチャー１体を対象とする。色１色か色複数を選ぶ。ターン終了時まで、それはその選ばれた色になる。
foreign_names.flavor: 頭の部分に５種類のレンズがあり、通常の視覚を超えた範囲の色で世界を眺める。

foreign_names.name: 잰걸음 개
foreign_names.text:
{T}: 원하는 색의 마나 한 개를 추가한다.
{T}: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 당신이 원하는 한 가지 색 또는 여러 가지 색이 된다.
foreign_names.flavor: 그것은 "머리"에 렌즈 다섯 개를 달고 있어서, 일반적인 지각 능력을 넘어서는 색채의 향연을 통해 세계를 바라본다.

foreign_names.name: Corredor Bufão
foreign_names.text:
{T}: Adicione um mana de qualquer cor.
{T}: A criatura alvo torna-se da cor ou cores de sua escolha até o final do turno.
foreign_names.flavor: Com cinco lentes na "cabeça", ele vê o mundo num espectro de cores além da percepção comum.

foreign_names.name: Бродяжка
foreign_names.text:
{T}: добавьте одну ману любого цвета.
{T}: целевое существо становится выбранного вами цвета или цветов до конца хода.
foreign_names.flavor: Через пять объективов на своей «голове» он видит мир в цветах, недоступных нашему обычному восприятию.

foreign_names.name: 急跑草人
foreign_names.text:
{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。
{T}：选择一种或多种颜色。目标生物成为该些颜色直到回合结束。
foreign_names.flavor: 它「头」上装着五色镜片，能够透过超越常人感知的色相观察世界。

foreign_names.name: 急跑草人
foreign_names.text:
{T}：加一點任意顏色的魔法力。
{T}：選擇一種或多種顏色。目標生物成為該些顏色直到回合結束。
foreign_names.flavor: 它「頭」上裝著五色鏡片，能夠透過超越常人感知的色相觀察世界。

name: Season of Growth
text:
Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.
flavor: "Awake, and lift your faces to the sun."
original_text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.) Whenever you cast a spell that targets a creature you control, draw a card.

rulings.text: If multiple creatures enter the battlefield under your control simultaneously, you’ll scry 1 for each of those creatures. You won’t look at more than one card from your library at once.
Season of Growth’s last ability resolves before the spell that caused it to trigger. It resolves even if that spell is countered.

Season of Growth’s last ability triggers when you cast a spell that has multiple targets, as long as at least one of those targets is a creature you control. It doesn’t trigger multiple times if you cast a spell that targets a creature you control multiple times or that targets multiple creatures you control.

foreign_names.name: Zeit des Wachstums
foreign_names.text:
Immer wenn eine Kreatur unter deiner Kontrolle ins Spiel kommt, wende Hellsicht 1 an. (Schaue dir die oberste Karte deiner Bibliothek an. Du kannst sie unter deine Bibliothek legen.)
Immer wenn du einen Zauberspruch wirkst, der eine Kreatur, die du kontrollierst, als Ziel hat, ziehe eine Karte.
foreign_names.flavor: „Erwacht und reckt eure Gesichter der Sonne entgegen."

foreign_names.name: Estación de crecimiento
foreign_names.text:
Siempre que una criatura entre al campo de batalla bajo tu control, adivina 1. (Mira la primera carta de tu biblioteca. Puedes poner esa carta en el fondo de tu biblioteca.)
Siempre que lances un hechizo que haga objetivo a una criatura que controlas, roba una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Despierten y alcen sus miradas al sol".

foreign_names.name: Saison de croissance
foreign_names.text:
À chaque fois qu'une créature arrive sur le champ de bataille sous votre contrôle, regard 1. (Regardez la carte du dessus de votre bibliothèque. Vous pouvez la mettre au-dessous de votre bibliothèque.)
À chaque fois que vous lancez un sort qui cible une créature que vous contrôlez, piochez une carte.
foreign_names.flavor: « Éveillez-vous, et levez la tête vers le soleil. »

foreign_names.name: Stagione della Crescita
foreign_names.text:
Ogniqualvolta una creatura entra nel campo di battaglia sotto il tuo controllo, profetizza 1. (Guarda la prima carta del tuo grimorio. Puoi mettere quella carta in fondo al tuo grimorio.)
Ogniqualvolta lanci una magia che bersaglia una creatura che controlli, pesca una carta.
foreign_names.flavor: "Destatevi e levate i volti al sole."

foreign_names.name: 成長の季節
foreign_names.text:
クリーチャーが１体あなたのコントロール下で戦場に出るたび、占術１を行う。（あなたのライブラリーの一番上のカードを見る。あなたはそのカードをあなたのライブラリーの一番下に置いてもよい。）
あなたが、あなたがコントロールしているクリーチャーを対象とする呪文を唱えるたび、カードを１枚引く。
foreign_names.flavor: 「目覚めよ。顔を上げ太陽に向けよ。」

foreign_names.name: 성장의 계절
foreign_names.text:
생물이 당신의 조종하에 전장에 들어올 때마다, 점술 1을 한다. (당신의 서고 맨 위 카드 한 장을 본다. 당신은 그 카드를 당신의 서고 맨 밑에 놓을 수 있다.)
당신이 조종하는 생물을 목표로 하는 주문을 당신이 발동할 때마다, 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.
foreign_names.flavor: "깨어나라. 그리고 네 얼굴을 태양을 향해 들어올려라."

foreign_names.name: Temporada de Crescimento
foreign_names.text:
Toda vez que uma criatura entrar no campo de batalha sob seu controle, use vidência 1. (Olhe o card do topo de seu grimório. Você pode colocar aquele card no fundo de seu grimório.)
Toda vez que você conjurar uma mágica que tenha uma criatura que você controla como alvo, compre um card.
foreign_names.flavor: "Despertem e ergam a face ao sol."

foreign_names.name: Сезон Роста
foreign_names.text:
Каждый раз, когда существо выходит на поле битвы под вашим контролем, предскажите 1. (Посмотрите верхнюю карту вашей библиотеки. Вы можете положить ту карту в низ вашей библиотеки.)
Каждый раз, когда вы разыгрываете заклинание, целью которого является существо под вашим контролем, возьмите карту.
foreign_names.flavor: «Пробудитесь и поднимите лица к солнцу».

foreign_names.name: 成长季节
foreign_names.text:
每当一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）
每当你施放以由你操控之生物为目标的咒语时，抓一张牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「醒来吧，迎向朝阳。」

foreign_names.name: 成長季節
foreign_names.text:
每當一個生物在你的操控下進戰場時，占卜1。（檢視你牌庫頂的牌。你可以將該牌置於你的牌庫底。）
每當你施放以由你操控之生物為目標的咒語時，抽一張牌。
foreign_names.flavor: 「醒來吧，迎向朝陽。」

name: Sedge Scorpion
text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavor:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave
original_text: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

foreign_names.name: Seggen-Skorpion
foreign_names.text: Todesberührung (Eine beliebige Menge Schadenspunkte, die er einer Kreatur zufügt, sind ausreichend, um diese zu zerstören.)
foreign_names.flavor:
Thakolides der Mächtige
Schlächter der Minotauren
Triumphator über die Riesen
Getötet von einem Skorpion
—Inschrift eines akroischen Grabsteins

foreign_names.name: Escorpión de los juncos
foreign_names.text: Toque mortal. (Cualquier cantidad de daño que esto haga a una criatura es suficiente para destruirla.)
foreign_names.flavor:
Takolides el Grande
Exterminador de minotauros
Avasallador de gigantes
Lo mató un escorpión.
—Inscripción en una tumba akroniense

foreign_names.name: Scorpion des laîches
foreign_names.text: Contact mortel (Le nombre de blessures que cette créature inflige à une créature, quel qu'il soit, est suffisant pour la détruire.)
foreign_names.flavor:
Thakolidès le puissant
Fléau des minotaures
Bourreau des géants
Terrassé par un scorpion
—Inscription sur une tombe akroenne

foreign_names.name: Scorpione del Falasco
foreign_names.text: Tocco letale (Qualsiasi danno che questa creatura infligge a una creatura è sufficiente a distruggerla.)
foreign_names.flavor:
Takolides il Possente
Terrore dei minotauri
Flagello dei giganti
Ucciso da uno scorpione
—Iscrizione su una tomba di Akros

foreign_names.name: 菅草の蠍
foreign_names.text: 接死（これが何らかのダメージをクリーチャーに与えたら、それだけで破壊する。）
foreign_names.flavor:
豪力なるサコリディーズ
数多のミノタウルスを屠りし者
幾多の巨人を破りし者
一匹の蠍により倒る
――アクロスの墓銘

foreign_names.name: 사초 전갈
foreign_names.text: 치명타 (이 생물에게 피해를 입은 생물은 피해의 양에 상관없이 파괴된다.)
foreign_names.flavor:
괴력의 사콜리데스
미노타우로스를 죽이고,
거인을 이겼지만,
전갈에게 목숨을 잃다.
—어느 아크로스 전사의 비문

foreign_names.name: Escorpião de Grama
foreign_names.text: Toque mortífero (Qualquer quantidade de dano que esta criatura cause a uma criatura é suficiente para destruí-la.)
foreign_names.flavor:
Tacólide, o Poderoso
Matador de minotauros
Subjugador de gigantes
Morto por um escorpião
— Inscrição em uma tumba acrosana

foreign_names.name: Осоковый Скорпион
foreign_names.text: Смертельное касание (Любое количество повреждений, которое этот объект наносит существу, достаточно, чтобы его уничтожить.)
foreign_names.flavor:
Таколид Могучий
Истребитель минотавров
Победитель гигантов
Убит скорпионом
— эпитафия на могиле в Акросе

foreign_names.name: 蓑草蝎子
foreign_names.text: 死触（它对生物造成的任何数量伤害都足以消灭后者。）
foreign_names.flavor:
强者萨克洛里得斯
牛头怪杀手
巨人征服者
因蝎子而死
～某阿喀洛斯人的墓志铭

foreign_names.name: 蓑草蠍子
foreign_names.text: 死觸（它對生物造成的任何數量傷害都足以消滅後者。）
foreign_names.flavor:
強者薩克洛里得斯
牛頭怪殺手
巨人征服者
因蠍子而死
～某阿喀洛斯人的墓誌銘

name: Sephara, Sky's Blade
text:
You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Flying, lifelink
Other creatures you control with flying have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)
original_text: You may pay {W} and tap four untapped creatures you control with flying rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Flying, lifelink Other creatures you control with flying have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

rulings.text: To pay Sephara’s alternative cost, you may tap any untapped creatures you control with flying, including ones you haven’t controlled continuously since the beginning of your most recent turn.

To determine the total cost of a spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying (such as Sephara’s alternative cost), add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the spell remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

Because damage remains marked on a creature until it’s removed as the turn ends, lethal damage dealt to other creatures you control with flying may cause them to be destroyed if Sephara leaves the battlefield during that turn.

foreign_names.name: Sephara, Klinge des Himmels
foreign_names.text:
Du kannst {W} bezahlen und vier ungetappte fliegende Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, tappen, anstatt die Manakosten für diesen Zauberspruch zu bezahlen.
Fliegend, Lebensverknüpfung
Andere fliegende Kreaturen, die du kontrollierst, haben Unzerstörbarkeit. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören sie nicht.)

foreign_names.name: Sephara, Acero Celestial
foreign_names.text:
Puedes pagar {W} y girar cuatro criaturas enderezadas que controlas con la habilidad de volar en vez de pagar el coste de maná de este hechizo.
Vuela, vínculo vital.
Las otras criaturas que controlas con la habilidad de volar tienen la habilidad de indestructible. (El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruye" no las destruyen.)

foreign_names.name: Séphara, lame du ciel
foreign_names.text:
Vous pouvez payer {W} et engager quatre créatures avec le vol dégagées que vous contrôlez à la place de payer le coût de mana de ce sort.
Vol, lien de vie
Les autres créatures avec le vol que vous contrôlez ont l'indestructible. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne les détruisent pas.)

foreign_names.name: Sephara, Lama del Cielo
foreign_names.text:
Puoi pagare {W} e TAPpare quattro creature STAPpate con volare che controlli invece di pagare il costo di mana di questa magia.
Volare, legame vitale
Le altre creature con volare che controlli hanno indistruttibile. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non le distruggono.)

foreign_names.name: 天空の刃、セファラ
foreign_names.text:
あなたは、この呪文のマナ・コストを支払うのではなく、{W}を支払いあなたがコントロールしていて飛行を持ちアンタップ状態であるクリーチャー４体をタップしてもよい。
飛行、絆魂
他の、あなたがコントロールしていて飛行を持つクリーチャーは破壊不能を持つ。（ダメージや「破壊する」と書かれた効果では、それらは破壊されない。）

foreign_names.name: 하늘의 검, 세파라
foreign_names.text:
당신은 이 주문의 마나 비용을 지불하는 대신 {W}를 지불하고 당신이 조종하는 비행을 가진 언탭된 생물 네 개를 탭할 수 있다.
비행, 생명연결
당신이 조종하는 비행을 가진 다른 생물들은 무적을 가진다. (피해와 "파괴"라고 명시된 효과로 파괴되지 않는다.)

foreign_names.name: Sephara, Lâmina dos Céus
foreign_names.text:
Você pode pagar {W} e virar quatro criaturas com voar desviradas que você controla em vez de pagar o custo de mana desta mágica.
Voar, vínculo com a vida
As outras criaturas que você controla com voar têm indestrutível. (Nem dano nem efeitos que dizem "destrua" podem destruí-las.)

foreign_names.name: Сефара, Клинок Небес
foreign_names.text:
Вы можете заплатить {W} и повернуть четыре неповернутых существа с Полетом под вашим контролем вместо оплаты мана-стоимости этого заклинания.
Полет, Цепь жизни

name: Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord
text:
[+1]: Target creature you control gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
[+1]: You may sacrifice a Vampire. When you do, Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
[−3]: You may put a Vampire creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.
original_text:
+1: Target creature you control gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
+1: You may sacrifice a Vampire. When you do, Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
−3: You may put a Vampire creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

rulings.text: Multiple instances of deathtouch and/or lifelink on the same creature are redundant.

Sorin’s second ability goes on the stack without a target. While that ability resolves, you may sacrifice a Vampire. When you do, the reflexive triggered ability triggers and you pick a target to be dealt damage. This is different from effects that say “If you do . . .” in that players may take actions after you’ve sacrificed the creature but before damage is dealt.
If the target of the reflexive triggered ability is an illegal target as that ability tries to resolve, it doesn’t resolve. You won’t gain 3 life.

The control-change effect from ability granted by Sorin’s last ability lasts indefinitely. It doesn’t wear off during the cleanup step, and it doesn’t expire if Sorin or a Vampire whose ability was activated leaves the battlefield. In a multiplayer game, it does expire if you leave the game.

name: Tale's End
text: Counter target activated ability, triggered ability, or legendary spell.
flavor:
"When you are gone, will anyone remember your story?"
—Unknown
original_text: Counter target activated ability, triggered ability, or legendary spell.

rulings.text: Tale’s End can’t target an activated or triggered mana ability. An activated mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool as it resolves, doesn’t have a target, and isn’t a loyalty ability. A triggered mana ability is one that adds mana to a player’s mana pool and triggers on an activated mana ability.
Activated abilities are written in the form “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities (such as equip) are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder texts, if applicable.

Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re often written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].” Some keyword abilities are triggered abilities and will have “when,” “whenever,” or “at” in their reminder text.

Abilities that create replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, can’t be targeted. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are also replacement effects and can’t be targeted.

If you counter a delayed triggered ability that triggered at the beginning of the “next” occurrence of a specified step or phase, that ability won’t trigger again the following time that step or phase occurs.

"Quando você se for, alguém vai se lembrar da sua história?"
— Desconhecido

foreign_names.name: Конец Истории
foreign_names.text: Отмените целевую активируемую способность, срабатывающую способность или легендарное заклинание.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Когда тебя не станет, вспомнит ли кто-нибудь твою историю?»
— Неизвестный

foreign_names.name: 传说终结
foreign_names.text: 反击目标起动式异能，触发式异能或传奇咒语。
foreign_names.flavor:
「你死去后，是否还会有人会记得你的故事？」
～无名氏

foreign_names.name: 傳說終結
foreign_names.text: 反擊目標起動式異能，觸發式異能或傳奇咒語。
foreign_names.flavor:
「你死去後，是否還會有人記得你的故事？」
～無名氏

name: Tectonic Rift
text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor:
"You will kneel before me, even if I have to split the earth under your feet!"
—Ash Kronor, Keldon warlord
original_text: Destroy target land. Creatures without flying can't block this turn.

rulings.text: If the target land is an illegal target by the time Tectonic Rift tries to resolve, the spell doesn’t resolve. Creatures without flying will be able to block as normal. If the target is legal but not destroyed (most likely because it has indestructible), creatures without flying will be unable to block.

Because it doesn’t modify the characteristics of creatures, Tectonic Rift can affect creatures that enter the battlefield or lose flying after the spell resolves, and it will stop affecting creatures that gain flying.

foreign_names.name: Tektonische Spalte
foreign_names.text: Zerstöre ein Land deiner Wahl. Nichtfliegende Kreaturen können in diesem Zug nicht blocken.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Du wirst vor mir niederknien, und wenn ich dafür die Erde unter deinen Füßen wegreißen muss."
—Ash Kronor, Keldonischer Kriegsfürst

foreign_names.name: Falla tectónica
foreign_names.text: Destruye la tierra objetivo. Las criaturas sin la habilidad de volar no pueden bloquear este turno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"¡Te arrodillarás ante mí, incluso si tengo que partir la tierra bajo tus pies!".
—Ash Krónor, señor guerrero de Keldon

foreign_names.name: Faille tectonique
foreign_names.text: Détruisez le terrain ciblé. Les créatures sans le vol ne peuvent pas bloquer ce tour-ci.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Tu t'agenouilleras devant moi, même si je dois pour cela fendre la terre sous tes pieds ! »
—Ash Kronor, seigneur de guerre kelde

foreign_names.name: Fossa Tettonica
foreign_names.text: Distruggi una terra bersaglio. Le creature senza volare non possono bloccare in questo turno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Ti inginocchierai davanti a me, a costo di spaccarti la terra sotto i piedi!"
—Ash Kronor, signore della guerra di Keld

foreign_names.name: 地盤の裂け目
foreign_names.text: 土地１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。このターン、飛行を持たないクリーチャーではブロックできない。
foreign_names.flavor:
「俺がお前の足元の大地を割らざるを得なかったとしても、お前は俺の前にひざまずく事になるのだ！」
――ケルドの大将軍、アシュ・クロノー

foreign_names.name: 지면 균열
foreign_names.text: 대지를 목표로 정한다. 그 대지를 파괴한다. 비행이 없는 생물들은 이 턴에 방어할 수 없다.
foreign_names.flavor:
"너는 내가 네 발밑의 땅을 가르는 한이 있더라도 내 앞에서 무릎을 꿇게 할 것이다!"
—켈드의 패왕, 애쉬 크로노르

foreign_names.name: Fenda Tectônica
foreign_names.text: Destrua o terreno alvo. As criaturas sem voar não podem bloquear neste turno.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Você se ajoelhará aos meus pés, mesmo que para isso eu tenha de partir ao meio a terra em que você pisa!"
— Ash Kronor, comandante keldoniano

foreign_names.name: Тектонический Разлом
foreign_names.text: Уничтожьте целевую землю. Существа без Полета не могут блокировать в этом ходу.
foreign_names.flavor:
«Ты преклонишь предо мной колени, даже если для этого мне потребуется расколоть землю у тебя под ногами!»
— Аш Кронор, келдонский военачальник

foreign_names.name: 地壳迸裂
foreign_names.text: 消灭目标地。不具飞行异能的生物本回合不能进行阻挡。
foreign_names.flavor:
「就算我得把你脚下的土地挖掉，也要让你向我屈膝！」
～凯尔顿军头艾许孔诺

foreign_names.name: 地殼迸裂
foreign_names.text: 消滅目標地。不具飛行異能的生物本回合不能進行阻擋。
foreign_names.flavor:
「就算我得把你腳下的土地挖掉，也要讓你向我屈膝！」
～凱爾頓軍頭艾許孔諾

rulings.text: When you scry, you may put all the cards you look at back on top of your library, you may put all of those cards on the bottom of your library, or you may put some of those cards on top and the rest of them on the bottom.
You choose how to order cards returned to your library after scrying no matter where you put them.
You perform the actions stated on a card in sequence. For some spells and abilities, that means you’ll scry last. For others, that means you’ll scry and then perform other actions.

Scry appears on some spells and abilities with one or more targets. If all of the spell or ability’s targets are illegal when it tries to resolve, it won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. You won’t scry.

name: Thicket Crasher
text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Other Elementals you control have trample.
flavor:
"Tread too hard in the forest and it will tread on you in return."
—Vivien Reid
original_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Other Elementals you control have trample.

foreign_names.name: Gestrüpptrampler
foreign_names.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden (Diese Kreatur kann überschüssigen Kampfschaden dem verteidigenden Spieler oder Planeswalker zufügen.)
Andere Elementarwesen, die du kontrollierst, verursachen Trampelschaden.
foreign_names.flavor:
„Trample zu hart auf dem Waldboden und der Wald trampelt zurück."
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Embestidor de matorrales
foreign_names.text:
Arrolla. (Esta criatura puede hacer el daño de combate sobrante al jugador o planeswalker al que ataca.)
Los otros Elementales que controlas tienen la habilidad de arrollar.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Si pisoteas el bosque, el bosque te pisoteará".
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Fracasseur des halliers
foreign_names.text:
Piétinement (Cette créature peut infliger son surplus de blessures de combat au joueur ou au planeswalker qu'elle attaque.)
Les autres élémentaux que vous contrôlez ont le piétinement.
foreign_names.flavor:
« Marchez un peu trop lourdement sur le sol de la forêt et elle vous marchera dessus à son tour. »
—Vivien Reid

foreign_names.name: Distruttore dei Boschi
foreign_names.text:
Travolgere (Questa creatura può infliggere il danno da combattimento in eccesso al giocatore o al planeswalker che sta attaccando.)
Gli altri Elementali che controlli hanno travolgere.
foreign_names.flavor:
"Se calpesti la foresta con troppa irruenza, ti calpesterà a sua volta."
—Vivien Reid

This spell can't be countered.

rulings.text: A spell or ability that counters spells can still target Thought Distortion. When that spell or ability resolves, Thought Distortion won’t be countered, but any additional effects of that spell or ability will still happen.

If the target player is an illegal target by the time Thought Distortion tries to resolve, the spell won’t resolve and will be put into its owner’s graveyard with no effect. This is true even though it can’t be countered.
